LightningComponentBundle.description: Shows the user’s most recently viewed records in a compact SLDS timeline.

property.name: cardTitle
property.label: List Title
property.description: Title to display at the top of the card

property.name: recordLimit
property.label: Number of recent records to show
property.description: How many of the user’s last‐viewed items to display

property.name: allowedObjects
property.label: Allowed Objects (comma‐separated)
property.description: Comma‐separated list of object API names to show (leave blank for all objects). e.g. Account,Contact,Custom__c

property.name: titleFieldsMapping
property.label: Title Field Overrides (semicolon‐separated)
property.description: Semicolon‐separated mapping of ObjectAPI:FieldAPI to use as the display title. e.g. Account:Name;Custom__c:CustomField__c

property.name: secondaryFieldsMapping
property.label: Secondary Field Overrides (semicolon‐separated)
property.description: Semicolon‐separated mapping of ObjectAPI:FieldAPI to use as a second displayed field in secondary title e.g. JobPosting__c:Status__c

property.name: lineSpacing
property.label: Use for SLDS 1 line spacing
property.description: Enable to use for the older SLDS 1 spacing.

property.name: helpText
property.label: Component: Tooltip
property.placeholder: Dette er en hjelpetekst for komponentet.
